title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 117.6 - Seed standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 117.6 - Seed standards

State Regulations

Representative samples of seed shall meet the following
general standards: Foundation

Certified

Pure seed
(minimum)........................................................................ 97.0%
97.0%
Other crop
seed........................................................................ 2.0%
2.0%
Weed
seeds........................................................................ 1.0%
3.0%
Inert matter
(maximum)........................................................................ 3.0%
3.0%
Germination
(minimum)........................................................................ 70.0%
70.0%
Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
